content.title: Cancer Immunotherapy
content.definition: Treatments that harness the immune system to recognize and destroy cancer cells
content.statement: Cancer Immunotherapy is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Oncology that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Cancer Immunotherapy helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Cancer Immunotherapy include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Cancer Immunotherapy.

citations.source: Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.
